titleStmt.title: James R. Garniss to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2168

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: San Francisco, San Francisco County, California

body.p:
San Francisco August 7th 1865
His Excellency
Hon Thomas E. Bramlette
Governor &c.
Frankfort, Ky.
Dr Sir

As my commission "appointing me a "Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky resident in San Franscisco" will expire by limitations on the 7th November 1865. I have taken this liberty to respectfully ask at your hands a re-appointment as above. As you will please to notice from the inclosed card. I am acting as Commissioner for several states, and the favor above asked from your Excellency. will be fully appreciated and thankfully received by.

Your Excellency's Obt Servt
James R. Garniss

Comr Deeds
California
Jas R. Garniss
apptd
12 Sept 1865
